shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary" (fols. 1ra-123vb) I-1) Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah (fols. 1ra-3vb) I-2) Introductory exhortation and hymns (fols. 3vb-6vb) I-3) ʾƎsäggǝd läki wä-ʾǝweddǝsäki... “I worship Thee…” (fols. 6vb-7va) I-4a) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary": 52 miracles (fols. 7va-91vb, 93ra-vb), incomplete? I-5) ʾAkkonu bǝʾǝsi... "Does not the man..." (distributed among the miracles of Mary, fols. 11ra-24vb, 37ra-39rb, 49ra-56vb, 72vb-83va) I-4b) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary": 40 miracles (fols. 92ra-vb, 94ra-123vb), incomplete

copyists.copyist: Zä-Wäldä Maryam (hand a) is mentioned as the scribe in fols. 56vb and 91vb.

donors.donor: ʿAmdä Maryam is mentioned in the supplication formulas throughout quires I-XII; Lǝbnä Dǝngǝl and his wife ʾAmätä Mikaʾel are mentioned in quires XIII-XVI.

dcomments.dcomment: Quires XIII-XVI were added probably somewhat later.

txstates.txstate: The front board is missing; the back board is damaged. Leather cover is completely torn off (traces of leather are visible on the back board). The sewing is destroyed. Many fols. are misplaced in quires II-XII. Holes or tears amended on fols. 11,19, 50, 59.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards (the front board is missing); previously covered with leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bnothers.bnother: Small holes or tears are visible on the spine fold of the quires, close to the head and tail of the codex.

squires.squire:
I(8/fols. 1r-8v) – II(8/fols. 9r-16v) – III(8/fols. 17r-24v) – IV(8/fols. 25r-32v) – V(8/fols. 33r-40v) – VI(8/fols. 41r-48v) – VII(8/fols. 49r-56v) – VIII(8/fols. 57r-64v) – IX(6/fols. 65r-70v) – X(8/fols. 71r-78v) – XI(8/fols. 79r-84v) – XII(7/fol. 85r-91v) – <XIII(8; s.l.: {2, no stub}; 7 stub after 1/fols. 92r-99v) – XIV(8/fols. 100r-107v) – XV(8/fols. 108r-115v) – XVI(8/fols. 116r-123v)>
The quire structure cannot be determined with certainty due to the poor condition of the Ms. Quires XIII-XVI, possibly originating from a different codex, were added later.

taunit.mr-info: All data are for fol. 10r. Text area I: quires I-XII.
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/B. Primary spricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling. The scribe did not use the bottom ruled line on fol. 3vb-8vb, 33ra-vb.

taunit.mr-info: All data are for fol. 95r. Text area II: quires XIII-XVI.
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary spricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

phandwritings.phandwriting: Hand a: very irregular. Hand b: rather fine.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a (Zä-Wäldä Maryam): fols. 1ra-91vb, 93ra-vb (quires I-XII), very irregularly formed letters. The involvement of more than one scribe cannot be excluded. Hand b: fols. 92ra-vb, 94ra-123vb (quire XIII-XVI), slender, slightly right-sloping letters.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; partly names of the donors; groups of lines in the incipit page of Texts I-I and I-4b; incipit of sections; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I-2 includes the hymns: - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä Maryam wäladitä ʾamlak ... "O my Lady Mary, Godbearing ..." (fol. 5va-vb) - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl bä-kǝlʾe Maryam Mariham ʾǝmmu lä-ʾIyäsus Krǝstos kähali ... "O my Lady, Holy Two-fold Virgin Mary, Mother of Jesus Christ the Almighty ..."(fol. 5vb) (cp. ChRep no. 373) - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst Maryam ʾǝmmä mädḫǝn wä-ʾǝmmä bǝrhan ... "O my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother of the Saviour and Mother of the Light ..." (fol. 6ra-vb).
Text I-5 is distributed as follows: strophes 12-13 (fols. 37ra-39rb); strophes 14-19 (fols. 49ra-56vb); strophes 20-26 (fols. 72va-83va); strophes 27-29 (fols. 17ra-24va); strophes 30-31, 33 (fols. 11ra-14rb).

extras.extra: - Erasures marked with thin lines: e.g., fols.15vb, 21rb, 49ra, 73rb, - Corrections are written over erasures on fols. 7vab or placed interlineally: e.g., fols. 5vb, 8va, 33vb, 59vb, 69vb. - Scribbling: fols. 34v, 36r, 65v.
